archimate:Principle.name: Core Principles
archimate:Principle.documentation: The principles published in a Governance Framework that apply broadly to all Trust Community Members. The Core Principles of the Sovrin Governance Framework are defined in Section 2 of the Sovrin Governance Framework Master Document.
